contacts.name: Asta
contacts.signature: I shouldn't buy any more stuff...

122130001.text: Nope, isn't he at the master control zone?

122130002.text: He's there when he has time to kill, but he's on a mission

122130003.text: Why would you ask me? I tried calling him over, he wouldn't even lift a paw. Why would he look for me

122130004.text: Peppy's a big boy now, he has his own ideas

122130005.text: A Curio was stolen recently, so I asked him to enlist your help...

122130006.text: I kept seeing him in the storage room, so I thought you met up

122130007.text: A Curio was stolen? You should allocate more money to upgrade the security system, lead researcher!

122130008.text: Any problem you can solve with money isn't a problem. This is a special case

122130009.text: Why would you send Peppy for me? If something's lost, shouldn't you ask the Security Department?

122130010.text: The lost Curio is the Joy Filtration Set, a cube used to store happiness. It's very popular among the researchers, judging by the consistently high application rate

122130011.text: I'd like to start investigating from the researchers, but lately... Madam Ruan Mei has been visiting the station

122130012.text: I'm worried this might not be a good look

122130013.text: Peppy has a sharp sense of smell and does not attract attention wandering about, so I think he is the best for this investigation

122130014.text: I've placed other zones under lockdown when everyone's focused on Madam Ruan Mei's visit

122130015.text: However, Peppy has gone radio silent. I'm concerned that it has run into danger. {NICKNAME}, can you go take a look?

122130016.text: Leave it to me, this is nothing

122130017.text: Great! I'll share its coordinates with you right away

122130018.text: Wait a sec, this all seems eerily familiar...

122130020.text: Oh, right, I installed a specially made device on Peppy. When you find him, remember to activate the beacon. There's a surprise for you
